name: oopsy daisy bandana
notes:
this bandana is constructed using small granny squares (and triangles!) which are then joined together. the border is then worked back and forth. 

gauge is not critical in this pattern, but will affect the final size of the bandana. each granny square is approx. 2.5 in x 2.5 in.

**yarn**

3 balls of hobbii friends cotton 8/6 in colours of your choice. sample shown uses whisky, white, and deep ocean.
**or**
3 x 100 yards of dk weight yarn 

tag me in your finished projects on ig: poetica.knitting
